item.title: Securing AWS Lambda Function URL with Cognito
item.description: In this post, we'll try to secure a lambda function which is configured as AuthType equals , which means this is publicly available forâ€¦
item.content:encoded: In this post, we'll try to secure a lambda function which is configured as AuthType equals None, which means this is publicly available for anyone to execute.
